items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals higher open for India, after Fed's 50bps rate cut
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: The Indian stock markets were expected to open higher on Thursday, following the US Federal Reserve's decision to cut policy rates by a widely expected 50bps.

items.title: Stocks To Watch: ICICI Securities, Nazara, NTPC, AB Capital, Tata Power
items.description: NTPC has filed for an IPO of its green energy arm, NTPC Green Energy Ltd, with an aim to raise approximately $1.2 billion (Rs 10,000 crore).

items.title: Stock market today: Sensex, Nifty strategy as US Fed cuts rate by 50 bps
items.description: Market today: Apart from the reaction to the US Federal Reserve's 50 bps rate cut, investors will focus on the last day of Northern Arc, Arkade Developers, and Western Carriers IPO

items.title: Jigar S Patel of Anand Rathi recommends buying these three stocks today
items.description: Over the past few months, IDFC First Bank has consistently maintained a strong support level between Rs 70-71, despite several challenges from downward market trends.

items.title: Nifty Auto, Energy bearish on charts; check key levels and trading strategy
items.description: The Nifty Energy Index is showing a bearish trend in the near term, as indicated by multiple technical indicators such as RSI, MACD, and Stochastic, which all suggest further downside movement.
